```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(foreign)

results <- read.spss(file = "docs/files/teachers_results_public.sav", to.data.frame=TRUE)

library("DT")
datatable(results, extensions = c('Buttons', 'Responsive'), options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
    scrollX = TRUE,
    fixedColumns = TRUE,
    pageLength = 3
  )
)
```
